long: Meaning: to "strike" (lightly or severely, literally or figuratively).  Usage: beat, cast forth, clap, give (wounds), × go forward, × indeed, kill, make (slaughter), murderer, punish, slaughter, slay(-er, -ing), smite(-r, -ing), strike, be stricken, (give) stripes, × surely, wound.  Source: a primitive root;
